name: Silhouette
overview: Puzzler based on shape recognition, originally released worldwide in 1990 as part of Gold Disk's AMIGA COMPLETE software compilation only, SILHOUETTE was later published as a budget standalone release in Denmark by Euro Power Pack. In the game you are tested on your ability to identify shapes. There will be six levels to complete. Each level is harder than the last. After the last level you will be compared to some baseline times. The lowest 10 times are saved to disk.
